The following code example will:

1. Create a `Client` which will connect to the [Shimmer Testnet](https://api.testnet.shimmer.network).
2. Create a `SecretManager` from a [mnemonic](02_generate_mnemonic.mdx).
3. [Generate a public address](03_generate_addresses.mdx).
4. [Build](07_create_block.mdx) and [post a block](08_post_block.mdx) with an output address and amount to send.
5. Log the transaction.

<IotaJs exampleURL='/iota.js/how_tos/transaction' />
